param.name: environ
param.dialogReference: A .gdb that contains all the rasters that will be used as environmental layers. Within this .gdb, each raster must contain a year (XXXX format) separated from the rest of the raster name with underscores ("_"). For example: the raster names should be something like "Chem_567_2012_Int"

param.name: caseFolder
param.dialogReference: The folder that contains the shp for the points at which exposure values will be extracted from the environmental layers. Input is the folder that contains the .shp file, not the .shp itself.

param.name: seg_num
param.displayname: Raster Name string segment that contains the year
param.dialogReference: With the environmental rasters being named something similar to "Chem_567_2012_Int", seg_num tells the tool how to locate each raster's year. In this example, the year "2012" is in the 2nd index of the file string, so seg_num should be 2.

param.name: pre_year
param.displayname: Raster Name string segment that PRECEEDS year
param.dialogReference: The section of the raster name that precedes the year. In the example of "Chem_567_2012_Int", pre-year = 'Chem_567_' (entered into the tool including underscores, but excluding quotation marks)

param.name: post_year
param.displayname: Raster Name string segment that FOLLOWS year
param.dialogReference: The section of the raster name that follows the year. In the example of "Chem_567_2012_Int", post-year = '_Int' (entered into the tool including underscores, but excluding quotation marks)
